statements: SELECT * FROM recipes;
SELECT recipe_name, cooking_time, created_at FROM recipes;
SELECT cooking_instructions FROM recipes WHERE recipe_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM recipes WHERE recipe_name LIKE '%salad%';
SELECT * FROM recipes ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT recipe_name, cooking_time, created_at FROM recipes WHERE recipe_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM recipes WHERE cooking_time > '01:00:00';
SELECT recipe_id, recipe_name, cooking_instructions FROM recipes WHERE created_at BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-05-01';
SELECT * FROM recipes WHERE recipe_name LIKE '%chicken%';
SELECT DISTINCT recipe_name FROM recipes ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM recipe_table
SELECT recipe_name, preparation_time FROM recipe_table WHERE cooking_time > 30
SELECT recipe_name, ingredients FROM recipe_table WHERE preparation_time < 60
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM cooking_instructions
SELECT recipe_name, preparation_time, cooking_time FROM recipe_table ORDER BY preparation_time ASC
SELECT recipe_id, recipe_name, preparation_time FROM recipe_table WHERE preparation_time < 30 ORDER BY recipe_name DESC
SELECT * FROM cooking_instructions WHERE instruction_id BETWEEN 1 AND 5 ORDER BY step_number
SELECT recipe_name, ingredients->'main_protein' AS main_protein FROM recipe_table WHERE ingredients->'main_protein' = 'Chicken'
SELECT recipe_name, preparation_time + cooking_time AS total_time FROM recipe_table WHERE preparation_time + cooking_time > 60 ORDER BY total_time

SELECT COALESCE(recipe_name, 'No Name') AS recipe_name, CASE WHEN preparation_time > 30 THEN 'Long Preparation' ELSE 'Short Preparation' END AS preparation_type FROM recipe_table ORDER BY preparation_time
SELECT * FROM recipe;
SELECT recipe_name, ingredients FROM recipe ORDER BY recipe_id DESC;
SELECT recipe_id, recipe_name, cooking_instructions FROM recipe WHERE recipe_name LIKE '%cake%';
SELECT * FROM cooking_times WHERE cooking_time > '01:00:00';
SELECT oven_name, cooking_capacity FROM oven ORDER BY cooking_capacity DESC;
SELECT recipe_name, ingredients FROM recipe WHERE recipe_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM cooking_times WHERE cooking_time > '01:00:00';
SELECT recipe_name, ingredients, cooking_instructions FROM recipe ORDER BY recipe_name DESC;
SELECT oven_name, oven_description FROM oven WHERE cooking_capacity > 4;
SELECT recipe_name, cooking_time FROM recipe JOIN cooking_times ON recipe.recipe_id = cooking_times.recipe_id WHERE cooking_time < '02:00:00';
SELECT * FROM recipe WHERE recipe_id = 1
SELECT recipe_name, ingredients[1] FROM recipe ORDER BY recipe_name
SELECT * FROM cooking_programs WHERE temperature > 350
SELECT program_id, program_name FROM cooking_programs WHERE duration < 60
SELECT timestamp, event FROM oven_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT recipe_name, ingredients FROM recipe WHERE recipe_id = 5;
SELECT program_name, temperature, duration FROM cooking_programs WHERE temperature > 350;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM oven_logs WHERE event LIKE 'oven%' AND timestamp > TIMESTAMP '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@domain.com';
SELECT * FROM recipe ORDER BY recipe_name DESC, recipe_id ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM recipes ORDER BY recipe_name DESC;
SELECT recipe_name, ingredients FROM recipes WHERE cooking_time < 30;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE created_at >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT oven_name, manufacturer, model FROM ovens WHERE manufacturer = 'Samsung';
SELECT recipe_name, ingredients, cooking_time FROM recipes WHERE cooking_time > 60 AND recipe_id IN (SELECT recipe_id FROM recipe_reviews WHERE rating > 4);
SELECT * FROM recipes;
SELECT recipe_name, ingredients FROM recipes WHERE cooking_time > 30;
SELECT oven_name, manufacturer, model FROM ovens ORDER BY manufacturer ASC;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE created_at >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT r.recipe_name, u.username, rr.rating FROM recipes r JOIN recipe_reviews rr ON r.recipe_id = rr.recipe_id JOIN users u ON rr.user_id = u.user_id WHERE rr.rating >= 4;
